content.raw:
Hi, I have some trouble in docker.
From today, I cannot launch FC by Cloudsim UI. Then, I tried to ssh to FC and execute "fc_run_team_docker.bash".
With it, I got some error message like below,

```bash
$ sudo ./fc_run_team_docker.bash 
running team's docker container
/home/ubuntu
xauth: (argv):1:  unable to read any entries from file "(stdin)"
```

Is there any idea about what is happed?
